about_the_game:
JUNE 15 2023, EXPERIMENTAL BUILD.
UPDATES TEND TO BREAK SAVE FILES.
TRY DISABLING IN STEAM CHECKBOX,
& THEN VERIFY INTERGRITY OF FILES.

Donate to help support Act II's development.
A Optional upgrade for content to Purchase.
This will be considered the complete version.
The free to play base game is a beta version.
Features the below enhancements for game.
^Updated, Dashed Out Early Access Content.

(1.)Double Mode ~ Acts As Developer Mode.
(A.)New Game Option to play a Easier Mode.
(B.)Automatic Combos, & Double EXP/GOLD.
(C.)Rare Loot, Unique Battle Class for Knight.
(D.)Treasure Pouch(Hold 5000$)Early Shops.
(E.)1,000 Starting Silver, & some other stuff.
This also includes other cut content/updates.
Refer to Early Access List on the base game.

(2022 Sept 1st)
Moving DLC Content to Base Game, September 1st.
DLC will now contain the Alpha for ACT II of Game.
^This will unlock over time, for anyone wanting to
test out content early. Check monthly for updates.

The Act I Content from DLC1 will still contain new
Side Quests made that'll slowly port to base game.
This will consist of any major free Side DLC as well.

(Reserved Date for Act II)

(2023 June 1st)
New Battle Engine Added, seen in picture/screenshot.
Characters now have back-facing models with limited
animation frames for attacking/defending & damaged.
Battle Screen+Enemies are now upscaled by 50% with
around 90% of the Enemies already reworked. A new
Battle Analyzer item is added to the game that shows
Enemies Battle Skill+Effects & Vulnerable/Resistances.
How ever about 33% of them still need to be finished.

Other additions/reworks have been made ingame for
the Battle Engine to function correctly. (Minor Bugs).
1.Had to cut 2 battles which used dialogue during it.
2.The screen centers & resizes when entering battles.
3.Improved Animations+New Vulnerable/Resistances.
Key_Items+Animations Moved, Requiring New Game.

content_descriptors.notes: Pixel scenes of some characters nothing to be concerned over.
